alert.note: Alert for Keokuk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 9:41PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Keokuk and southwestern Washington Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 941 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hedrick, or 11 miles northeast of Ottumwa, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Martinsburg around 945 PM CST. Hayesville around 950 PM CST. Richland around 1000 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Harper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
